mapper.select: /****** [ supply.purchase.dayListSelect ] ******/ SELECT * FROM ( SELECT TOP 1 YYYYMMDD FROM TB_MST_CALENDAR WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE YEARWEEK < @{yearWeek} AND DAY_NM = 'THU' ORDER BY YYYYMMDD DESC ) A1 UNION ALL SELECT * FROM ( SELECT YYYYMMDD FROM TB_MST_CALENDAR WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE YEARWEEK = @{yearWeek} AND DAY_NM = 'WED' ) A2 UNION ALL SELECT DAY_NM FROM TB_MST_CALENDAR WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE YYYYMMDD = CONVERT(VARCHAR, DBO.UFN_GETDATE(), 112)
mapper.update: /****** [ supply.purchase.materialPlanRateListUpdate ] ******/ MERGE INTO TB_HIS_GR_COMP A USING ( SELECT @{GV_COMPANY_CD} AS COMPANY_CD , @{GV_BU_CD} AS BU_CD , @{YEAR_WEEK} AS PLAN_WEEK , @{ITEM_CD} AS ITEM_CD , @{REMARK} AS REMARK , @{AVAIL_GR_DATE} AS AVAIL_GR_DATE ) B ON ( A.COMPANY_CD = B.COMPANY_CD AND A.BU_CD = B.BU_CD AND A.PLAN_WEEK = B.PLAN_WEEK AND A.ITEM_CD = B.ITEM_CD ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET REMARK = B.REMARK , AVAIL_GR_DATE = B.AVAIL_GR_DATE , UPDATE_ID = @{GV_USER_ID} , UPDATE_DTTM = DBO.UFN_GETDATE() WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( COMPANY_CD , BU_CD , ITEM_CD , PLAN_WEEK , REMARK , AVAIL_GR_DATE , CREATE_ID , CREATE_DTTM )VALUES( B.COMPANY_CD , B.BU_CD , B.ITEM_CD , B.PLAN_WEEK , B.REMARK , B.AVAIL_GR_DATE , @{GV_USER_ID} , DBO.UFN_GETDATE() );
mapper.select: /****** [ supply.purchase.materialPlanRateDetailListExcelSqlSelect ] ******/ SELECT CASE WHEN A2.MENU_CD = @{popUpMenuCd} THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS USE_FLAG , A2.ACTION_CD FROM ( SELECT BU_CD , ROLE_CD FROM TB_MAP_USER_ROLE WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE USER_ID = @{GV_USER_ID} AND BU_CD = @{GV_BU_CD} AND USE_FLAG = 'Y' ) A1 INNER JOIN ( SELECT COMPANY_CD , BU_CD , ROLE_CD , MENU_CD , ACTION_CD FROM TB_MAP_ROLE_MENU_ACTION WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE COMPANY_CD = @{GV_COMPANY_CD} AND BU_CD = @{GV_BU_CD} AND MENU_CD = @{popUpMenuCd} AND ACTION_CD IN ('EXCEL','SQL') AND USE_FLAG = 'Y' ) A2 ON A1.BU_CD = A2.BU_CD AND A1.ROLE_CD = A2.ROLE_CD GROUP BY A2.MENU_CD , A2.ACTION_CD
